entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with flurries at times heavy changing to 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h then west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
